title: Beans on Toast
instructions: Put bread in the toaster. Cook beans. Pour beans onto toast.

title: Egg and Bacon on toast
instructions: Remove Yolk. Heat up egg. Release bacon from its plastic prison. Put them on separate pieces of bun.

title: Slime on Toast
instructions: Gently place toast into toasting apparatus. Blend Industrial Slime with Uranium isotope and 1 big mushroom. Pour resulting slop onto toast. Serve with a glass of glass

title: Darkened Toast
instructions: Gently incinerate bread to a golden black colour.
